arts.ttl: Gomez shines as Brighton claim comfortable win over Leeds
arts.sum: Diego Gomez nets twice and Danny Welbeck scores for third successive league game as Brighton comfortably beat Leeds to move into the top-half of the Premier League table.

arts.ttl: Brilliant Brighton thrash Leeds to go within touching distance of top four
arts.sum: Brighton proved far too strong for Leeds United as the Seagulls powered to a comfortable 3-0 victory in front of their home fans at the Amex Stadium.

arts.ttl: Brighton vs Leeds United ‚Äì Match Preview and Team News
arts.sum: Brighton & Hove Albion host Leeds United on Saturday in a match defined by a remarkable historical record. The Seagulls have never lost a Premier League match to Leeds. Furthermore, they have kept a clean sheet in their last seven consecutive home league games against them.
